customers.usage_stats: Image workspace: 39 unique users (down 7%). Voxel art generator: 14 unique users (down 30%). Total images generated: 1080 (down 35%). Total voxel models generated: 150 (up 224%). Generation time: 7.5 (up 42%). Generation time top 10 users: 6.5 (up 91%).

team.operation_notes: Continuing process for hiring first engineers.

product_updates.description: Upgraded image workspace to be ~3x faster with same quality.
Complete 3D model generator upgrade reducing polygon count to ~20% of prior level.
Experimented with $12 plan for 4 hours of generation time, 2.5x more popular than $30 plan.
product_updates.impact: Lower-priced plan more attractive for new users.

notes: Image workspace usage decreased while 3D usage increased. Revenue up 17% MoM. Image workspace remains confusing for new users; design improvable. January goal: make image workspace real-time for better user experience.
